properties.name: center
properties.desc: if the popup is always centered

properties.name: buttons_enabled
properties.desc: enable buttons at start, defaults to true

properties.name: overlay
properties.desc: if the popup has an overlay at start, defaults to false

properties.name: html
properties.desc: shortcut to creating html in its placeholder, optional

properties.name: template
properties.desc: shortcut to creating a template in its placeholder, optional

properties.name: view
properties.desc: shortcut to creating a view in its placeholder, optional

properties.name: css
properties.desc: additional css for the placeholder, optional

events.name: OGX.Popup.CLICK_BUTTON
events.desc: when a button has been clicked
